title: Im Only getting the PBE Client?????
body: I've i have gotten a new computer and Im trying to get the download to play league and whenever i try to use the normal launcher i keep getting PBE Client, when i use the normal or live server download i get the PBE Launcher

replies.body: PBE and Live are separate clients, so you shouldn't be able to select those regions on the same patcher.  Make sure you are downloading the live client directly from the official link [here](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload).  Hope that helps!
